text: Hi! Has anyone implemented a blog listing page with multiple tag filtering? In addition to the multiple tag filter, I would also like to implement a search bar to search through the blog posts and have pagination:crossed_fingers:
Did you figure out the multiple tag filter <@UDJV5B73R>?
Hey HS devs, For some reason, the cursor in my hero banner won’t change to a pointer. I’ve called it in every way possible, but I’m stumped. Has anyone else had this issue? <https://www.resonai.com/>
I haven’t noticed this in a while, but I know this is occasionally an issue on a Mac when Photoshop is open.
